resources.string: The Dog Sledding Experience in Alaska

Have you ever dreamed of being pulled through frost-bitten tundra by a team of savage, rabid animals that at any moment can realize that they outnumber you and can take you in an instant? Then do we have a fully-immersive experience for you! Come experience Alaska\'s strange obsession of recreating Santa\'s sleigh ride on the ground being pulled by a frenzied group of bloodthirsty animals!
Pick a Day for Your Sledding Experience
